channel.title: Dedicated Server vs Virtual Private Server?
channel.description:
What do you think is better a dedicated server or a partitioned off part of a dedicated server (VPS) that costs less, and is pretty much the same?
I myself would prefer dedicated, what do you guys think?

item.title: Dedicated Server vs Virtual Private Server?
item.dc:creator: @parad0x parad0x_
item.description:
@parad0x wrote:

ok thank you![br][size=1]Posted at: October 29, 2006, 01:14:58 AM[/size][hr]oh yea by the way i’m looking for a company that offers webmin in their dedicated servers
could they install this for me?
thanks
